subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Detroit’s game against Chicago looks like it will be more competitive than it would have been a couple weeks ago, when the Lions were among the N.F.L.'s top teams and the Bears had allowed a combined 106 points in back-to-back losses.
snippet: Detroit’s game against Chicago looks like it will be more competitive than it would have been a couple weeks ago, when the Lions were among the N.F.L.'s top teams and the Bears had allowed a combined 106 points in back-to-back losses.
